body_html:
This does look like TensorFlow is unable to find the cuDNN library.
Could you please double check that you followed the instructions on this page for installation of cuDNN and adding the installation directory to your %PATH% environment variable?
body_text:
This does look like TensorFlow is unable to find the cuDNN library.
Could you please double check that you followed the instructions on this page for installation of cuDNN and adding the installation directory to  your %PATH% environment variable?
body:
This does look like TensorFlow is unable to find the cuDNN library.  
Could you please double check that you followed the instructions on [this](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows) page for installation of cuDNN and adding the installation directory to  your `%PATH%` environment variable?
